result.execSummary:
The defendant Trevor L Ritchie was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Contact after Domestic Abuse Arrest [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 968.075(5)(a)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Marathon County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Maintain GFE in fulltime employment/schooling/combination of the two.

Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. 
No contact with victim B.L.C. unless allowed by agent.

Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent.
Complete AODA assessment w/ follow up.
Enroll and successfully complete SAFE program intake program.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

supervisions.notes:
Jail may be with huber release for work, work search, treatment, or child care if meets jail criteria.
Concurrent with: Each other.

probation revocation packet

Clerk: Kimberly
Case called: 8:57am
INCLUDES 15CM1167, 16CF404, 17CM297, 17CM1766
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo in 15CM1167, 16CF404, 17CM1766 & for ADA Raymond Pelrine in 17CM297; Defendant appears in person, in custody, with Atty Camille Silliman.
Date and time set for SAR in 15CM1167, 16CF404, & 17CM297 and plea hearing in 17CM1766

** SAR in 15CM1167, 16CF404, 17CM297 **
Parties state recommendation for sentencing.
COURT ORDERS: 15CM1167 Ct. 1- Contact after domestic abuse arrest- repeater: Serve 1 year MCJ. 119 days credit granted. Jail may be with huber release for work, work search, treatment, or child care if meets jail criteria. Any outstanding costs- $176.00 CC, $200.00 DNA surcharge, $67.00 victim witness surcharge for total of $443.00 is converted into civil judgment
COURT ORDERS: 16CF404 Ct. 1- Possession of Narcotic Drugs- repeater: 3 and half years WSPS- 1 and half years IC, 2 years ES. Deft is eligible for both prison programming- Substance Abuse & Challenge Incarceration. CONDITIONS of ES: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Maintain GFE in full time employment/schooling/combination of two. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Any outstanding fees are to be paid as condition of ES. Ct. 4 Resisting or Obstructing an Officer- repeater: Serve 1 year MCJ. 193 days credit granted on both counts. Jail may be with huber release for work, work search, treatment, or child care if meets jail criteria.
COURT ORDERS: 17CM297 Ct. 1- Possess Drug Paraphernalia- repeater: Serve 9 months MCJ. 105 days credit granted. Jail may be with huber release for work, work search, treatment, or child care if meets jail criteria. Any outstanding costs- $176.00 CC, $200.00 DNA surcharge, $67.00 victim witness surcharge for total of $443.00 is converted into civil judgment.

** IA & PLEA in 17CM1766 **
COURT QUASHES ARREST WARRANT
W/R. R/J. 

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
State moves to:
Ct. 2 Resisting or Obstructing an Officer- repeater >> D&RI
COURT grants above
PLEA:
Ct. 1 Resisting or Obstructing an Officer- repeater >> GUILTY
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: Serve 9 months MCJ. Zero days credit granted. Jail may be with huber release for work, work search, treatment, or child care if meets jail criteria. Pay CC. Pay DNA surcharge and provide sample. 

**ALL SENTENCES TO RUN CONCURRENT TO EACH OTHER. 
Adj: 9:13am
Lincoln County Jail
